nodes.text: Ardees Rabang Jundis was an "assistant to controller" for Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace and was one of two US Assistants to Rick McCallum during the production of Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones and Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith.
She later served as assistant to McCallum again for George Lucas' 2012 film Red Tails.
The beverage ardees was named after her.
